p: Parasite cultures employed in this study were Trypanosoma cruzi (SC2005 strain). Trypomastigote forms were obtained from Vero cells infected and used to infect the macrophages. Epimatigote forms were originated from the suspension of cell culture trypomastigotes in 3 mL of liver infusion tryptose (LIT) medium supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS), 100 U/mL of penicillin and 100 μg/mL of streptomycin), and incubated in an oven at 28 °C until complete differentiation of parasites.
